Caption: The dignitaries in discussion during the high tea ceremony that was thrown in honour of Mr. Hans Lenzâ€™s(Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) visit to IIT Madras
Description: On 30th January, 1964 Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. During the ceremony, Mr. Hans Lenz interacted with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members present. In the image, Mr. Hans Lenz converses with the dignitaries over refreshments. Seated from the left: Mr. Gerhard Fisher (Consul General, FRG), Prof. R. A. Kraus (Adviser to the Government of India for IIT Madras), Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and Mr. Hans Lenz
